author: MasterJumpyCake
title: Xtra 40368 Review
review:
This will be a very short review. 

Lego set 40368 is a nice simple set, fitting in with the Xtra line of accessory polybags. It includes loads of cool parts and mini-builds, and would make a great addition to any Christmas LEGO scene. For £3.99, that is a good price.
